summary: All vampire lord perks in one file :)
descriptionHtml:
THIS SIMPLY UNLOCKS ALL OF THE PERKS FOR THE VAMPIRE LORD IN SKYRIM. REQUIRES DAWNGUARD.

MAKE SURE YOU ARE IN VAMPIRE LORD FORM WHEN YOU ACTIVATE THIS!

[Dawnguard must be at the top of the data files list in your skyrim launcher. Open skyrim > data files > click dawnguard > keep clicking the up arrow until it gets to the top > enjoy! :]

When you exit Vampire Lord Form you will find 3x Rings in your inventory, get rid of all 3 or you will have to re apply the .txt file every time you enter Vampire lord form. (they all look similar, one is called Ring of Vampiric Grip, another Ring of the Gargoyle and the other one is Ring of Reanimate Corpse, you can sell them or throw them into a river or whatever xD)

Copy dracula.txt to the /data folder of skyrim and load up your game and in game typre \"bat dracula\" into the console and check your vampire lord perks ^.^ :D have fun !!
(to use the powers check your favourites menu when in Vampire Lord Form)
[NOTE: You need Dawnguard for this :)]
author: SONNYSPAK
